title: What are some questions about the universe that we will never know the answer to? - Quora

response.answer_text: “What happens next?” There’s always another next and someday I’m going to run out my quota. I’ll never know the future beyond me. But young people will find out what happens next, and some of them may even help determine what happens next. For awhile. So much bad I see seems destined to devolve into far, far worse. The resolution? Older generations will soon no longer be around to ask what happens next. I don’t wonder about the next after next, a sadly childish question.
